ui.scene

Class MapEditingScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ui.view.View
              • ui.scene.Scene
                • ui.scene.MapEditingScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, EquipmentSelectorPanel.Delegate, PlayerSelectorPanel.Delegate, GameMapView.Delegate

    public class MapEditingScene
extends Scene
implements GameMapView.Delegate, PlayerSelectorPanel.Delegate, EquipmentSelectorPanel.Delegate
    This MapEditingScene class is for editing game map view which extends Scene class And implements GameMapView.Delegate, PlayerDelegate, EquipmentDelegate
    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Siyu Chen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • build

        public void build(Cell cell)
        This method gets a cell location from triggered events and refresh the Content View Layer with add a new cell on that. After that, it calls refreshControlView() method to reset controlViewContainerView.
        Parameters:
        cell -

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        This method gets a cell location from triggered events and refresh the Content View Layer with remove that cell on a layer view. After that, it calls refreshControlView() method to reset controlViewContainerView.
